description.value: Your target glows with a magical aura visible only to you and those who follow your lead. Your target is visible to you and others sharing your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.0nIOGpHQNHsKSFKT]{Hunt Prey} benefits even if it wouldn't normally be due to lighting or the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} conditions, though cover from opaque objects still blocks your sight. You ignore the flat check against the target due to the Concealed condition, and the target isn't automatically @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from you due to darkness or being Invisible.
